snippet.title: Noctambulant — Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Store Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1620640/Noctambulant/

Game Description
Noctambulant is a hand-drawn 2D indie survival and psychological horror game. Renee moves in with her grandmother after the passing of her parents in a tragic accident. Walk with Renee and unfold the terrifying mystery as to why she was made to go to bed early every night.

Social
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/jarze.games/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/jarzegames

Credits
Background Music : Joan Quah
Some of the sound effects : Production Crate

#unity #steam #gaming #games #indie #gamedev #madewithunity #noctambulantgame
